property.name: arVvdVesselId
property.meta: Vessel Class Id. Must be unique within Vessel classes

property.name: arVvdIsDrayOff
property.meta: check whether it is dray off or not

property.name: arVvdIsNoClientAccess
property.meta: Check whether it has no client access or not

property.name: arVvdIsCommonCarrier
property.meta: Check whether the visiting vessel is a common carrier or not

property.name: arVvdTimePilotOnBoard
property.meta: Time when the pilot is on board

property.name: arVvdTimePilotOffBoard
property.meta: Time during which the pilot is off board

component.name: arVvdEstMoveCount
component.meta: Estimate the move counts of the vessel

property.name: arVvlineOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arVvlineArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this unit was archived.

many-to-one.name: arVvlineVvd
many-to-one.meta: Vessel Identity of the vessel in the visit visitlines

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.ArchiveVesselVisitBerthing
class.meta: create index ar_brthg_pos_anchor_idx on vsl_ar_vessel_berthings(pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;
create spatial index ar_brthg_pos_anchor_idx on vsl_ar_vessel_berthings(pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: arBrthgOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arBrthgArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this unit was archived.

property.name: arBrthgShipSideTo
property.meta: Berthing side-to (port side-to, or starboard side-to)

property.name: arPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: arPosOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: arPosBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.ArchiveLateArrival
class.meta: Archived Late arrivals for a Archived Vessel Visit

property.name: arVvlateVvdGkey
property.meta: Vessel visit for which late arrival is expected

property.name: arVvlateUfvGkey
property.meta: Unit eventually received against late arrival entry

property.name: arVvlateCutoff
property.meta: Late Arrival Cutoff Time (ATD if null)

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.operation.ArchiveLineLoadList
class.meta: Entity representing the Loadlist information as sent by Line Operator

property.name: arLinellOriginalGkey
property.meta: Gkey of the original Loadlist before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arLinellSenderId
property.meta: Id of Line Operator who sends the Load List - value from EDI

property.name: arLinellLineOperatorId
property.meta: Id of Line Operator who sends the Load List

property.name: arLinellVesselVisitId
property.meta: Id of Vessel Visit for which the Loadlist pertains to

property.name: arLinellVesselVisitGkey
property.meta: Gkey of Vessel Visit for which the Loadlist pertains to

many-to-one.name: arLinellComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which Loadlist info. belongs.

property.name: arLinellCtrEquipTypeId
property.meta: Container ISO Type Id from reference table

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.operation.ArchiveLineDischargeList
class.meta: Entity representing the Discharge List information as sent by Line Operator

property.name: arLinedlOriginalGkey
property.meta: Gkey of the original Discharge list before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arLinedlSenderId
property.meta: Id of Line Operator who sends the Discharge List - value from EDI

property.name: arLinedlLineOperatorId
property.meta: Id of Line Operator who sends the Discharge List

property.name: arLinedlIbVesselVisitGkey
property.meta: Gkey of Vessel Visit for which the Discharge List pertains to

property.name: arLinedlIbVesselVisitId
property.meta: Id of Vessel Visit for which the Discharge List pertains to

property.name: arLinedlObVesselVisitGkey
property.meta: Gkey Vessel Visit which carries Transship containers

property.name: arLinedlObVesselVisitId
property.meta: Id of Vessel Visit which carries Transship containers

many-to-one.name: arLinedlComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which Discharge list info. belongs.

property.name: arLinedlCtrEquipTypeId
property.meta: Container ISO Type Id from reference table

property.name: arLinedlPOLId
property.meta: Id of Container Port Of Load

property.name: arLinedlPODId
property.meta: Id of Container Port Of Discharge

property.name: arLinedlOPLId
property.meta: Id of Origninal Port Of Load

property.name: arLinedlPOD2Id
property.meta: Id of Container Second Port Of Discharge
